org.sakaiproject.sms.hibernate.dao
Class HibernateUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.sakaiproject.sms.hibernate.util.HibernateUtil

public class HibernateUtil
extends java.lang.Object

Configures hibernate with mapping definitions and configuration properties for use in the application. Implements a singleton for creating a hibernate template that creates individual hibernate sessions on a per thread basis.

The hibernate session factory is initialised from the database mapping file hibernate-mappings.hbm.xml and from the hibernate configuration properties, hibernate.properties. Both files are expected to be available on the classpath.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Julian Wyngaard
